Title: jQuery Asp.net Controls by David Taylor
Description: This is a set of web controls utilising the jQuery and jQuery dependent javascript libraries. The aim is to create a set of reusable customisable controls which use unobtrusive javascript.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This is a set of web controls utilising the jQuery and jQuery dependent javascript libraries. The aim is to create a set of reusable customisable controls which use unobtrusive javascript.

As I have benefited so many times from other peopleâ€™s code I feel the need to give something back so this is my chance to give back something to the open-souce community. I have started a project to put together some Asp.net controls which utilise the jQuery and jQuery dependent javascript libraries.

Initially here is the jQuery Star Rating Asp.Net web control. It comes in three sections: the vb.net webcontrol, the css and the javascript. Credit and thanks to Ritesh Agrawal (http://php.scripts.psu.edu/rja171/widgets/rating.php) and the guy from PHP Letter (http://www.phpletter.com/Demo/Jquery-Star-Rating-Plugin/) for the jQuery and css code. I have made small modifications to the jQuery code to grab the currently selected rating from the selected radio button.
